en: “One last thing. Quick. A suitcase, get it, fill it with your dirtiest clothes, an old suit, the dirtier the better, a shirt, some old sneakers and socks . . . .”
vi: "Thêm một điều cuối. Nhanh lên. Lấy một cái va li, nhét vào đó những quần áo bẩn nhất của ông, một bộ com lê cũ, càng bẩn càng tốt, một sơ mi, vài đôi giày vớ cũ..."
tr: “Son bir şey. Çabuk. Bir bavul bul, onu en kirli elbiselerinle doldur, eski bir elbise, ne kadar kirli olursa o kadar iyi olur, bir gömlek, bazı eski lastik ayakkabı ve çorap...

vi_translation: "One last thing. Hurry up. Take a suitcase, pack in it your dirtiest clothes, an old suit, the dirtier the better, a shirt, and a few pairs of old shoes and socks..."
tr_translation: “One last thing. Quickly. Find a suitcase, fill it with your dirtiest clothes, an old dress, the dirtier the better, a shirt, some old rubber shoes, and socks...”
es_translation: —Another thing, quickly! A suitcase. Grab it, with your dirtiest clothes, an old rag, the dirtier the better, a shirt, some socks, and old shoes...

en: He stopped for breath, on his way to the river, to peer through dimly lit windows of wakened houses, and saw the silhouettes of people inside watching their parlour walls and there on the walls the Mechanical Hound, a breath of neon vapour, spidered along, here and gone, here and gone! Now at Elm Terrace, Lincoln, Oak, Park, and up the alley toward Faber's house.
en_results: "title": "Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?", "author": "Philip K. Dick"
vi: Anh dừng lại thở, trên đường ra sông, để nhìn qua cửa sổ đèn sáng tù mù của các căn nhà đã bị đánh thức, thấy hình dáng những người đang ngồi xem truyền hình trong phòng khách và kia trên những bức tường là con Chó Máy, một luồng hơi nê ông, đảo chân như một con nhện, thoắt hiện thoắt biến, thoắt hiện thoắt biến! Mới đó ở Elm Terrace, Lincoln, Oak, Park, giờ đã ngay trên con ngõ dẫn đến nhà Faber!
tr: Nehre doğru giderken nefes almak ve uyanmış evlerin zayıf ışıklı pencerelerinden, insan siluetleri oturma odalarının duvarını izlerken, gizlice gözetleyebilmek için durdu. Duvarlarda Mekanik Tazı, neon bir soluk gibi, örümcek bacaklarıyla ilerliyordu. Şurası, gitmiş; orası, gitmiş! Şimdi Elm Terrace’da, Lincoln, Oak, Park ve cber’in evine doğru.
es: Se detuvo para recobrar el aliento, camino del río. Atisbó por las ventanas débilmente iluminadas de las casas las siluetas de sus habitantes que contemplaban en los televisores murales al Sabueso Mecánico, un suspiro de vapor de neón, que corría veloz. Ahora, en Elm Terrace, Lincoln, Cak, Park, y calle arriba hacia la casa de Faber.
vi_translation: He stopped to catch his breath, on the way to the river, to look through the dimly lit windows of the houses that had been awakened, seeing the shapes of people sitting and watching television in the living rooms, and there on the walls was the Mechanical Hound, a neon glow, moving its legs like a spider, appearing and disappearing, appearing and disappearing! Just now at Elm Terrace, Lincoln, Oak, Park, and now right on the alley leading to Faber's house!
tr_translation: While heading towards the river, he paused to catch his breath and secretly observe from the dimly lit windows of the awakened houses, watching human silhouettes trace the walls of the living rooms. On the walls, the Mechanical Hound moved with spider-like legs, like a neon breath. This place, gone; that place, gone! Now on Elm Terrace, towards the homes of Lincoln, Oak, Park, and cber.
es_translation: He stopped to catch his breath, on the way to the river. He peeked through the dimly lit windows of the houses at the silhouettes of their inhabitants who were watching on their mural televisions the Mechanical Hound, a neon vapor sigh, running swiftly. Now, on Elm Terrace, Lincoln, Cak, Park, and up the street towards Faber's house.
st: O ile a emisa ho hema, tseleng ea hae ho ea nōkeng, ho ea lithakeng ka lifensetere tse khanyang tsa matlo a tsositsoeng, 'me a bona li-silhouettes tsa batho ba ka hare ba shebeletse mabota a bona a parlour mme moo maboteng a Mechanical Hound, phefumoloho ea neon vapour, spidered hammoho, mona le ea, mona le eang teng! Hona joale ho Elm Terrace, Lincoln, Oak, Park, le ho fihlela alley nģ'a ntlo ea Faber.
yo: Ó dúró fún èémí, ní ọ̀nà rẹ̀ lọ sí odò, láti wo àwọn fèrèsé tí iná rẹ̀ kò mọ́lẹ̀ ti àwọn ilé tí wọ́n jí, ó sì rí àwòrán àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n wà nínú wọn tí wọ́n ń wo ògiri ilé ìgbafẹ́ wọn àti níbẹ̀ lórí ògiri Mechanical Hound, èémí vapour neon, tí wọ́n fọ́ pẹ̀lú, níbí ó sì lọ, níbí ó sì lọ! Ní báyìí ní Elm Terrace, Lincoln, Oak, Park, àti lókè ọ̀nà sí ilé Faber.
tn: O ne a emisa go hema, fa a ya kwa nokeng, go ya kwa ntlong e e neng e le metsi a a neng a agilwe, mme a bona di-silhouettes tsa batho ba ba mo teng ba lebile dipota tsa bone tsa parlour le gona mo maboteng a Mechanical Hound, moya wa neon vapour, spidered along, here and gone, here and gone! Go go, go go
ty: Ua faaea oia no te huti i te aho, a haere ai oia i roto i te anavai, no te hi'o na roto i te mau haamaramarama mohimohi o te mau fare, e ua ite oia i te mau hoho'a mata o te mau taata i roto i te mataitairaa i to ratou mau patu e i nia i te mau papai o te Mechanical Hound, te hoê hutiraa aho o te neon hound, te fee, i ǒ nei e te reva, i ǒ nei e a reva ' tu ai! I teie nei, i Elm Terrace, Lincoln, Oak, Park, e i nia i te purumu e tae atu ai i te fare o Faber.

en: “Police suggest entire population in the Elm Terrace area do as follows: Everyone in every house in every street open a front or rear door or look from the windows. The fugitive cannot escape if everyone in the next minute looks from his house. Ready! “
vi: "Cảnh sát đề nghị toàn bộ dân chúng trong khu vực Elm Terrace làm như sau: Mỗi người trong mỗi căn nhà trên mỗi đường phố hãy mở một cánh cửa phía trước hay phía sau hoặc nhìn ra ngoài cửa sổ. Kẻ chạy trốn sẽ không thể thoát nếu sau đây một phút tất cả mọi người nhìn ra khỏi nhà mình, sẵn sàng!"
tr: “Polis, Elm Terrace bölgesinin bütün halkından şunları yapmasını istemektedir. Bütün sokaklarda her bir evde oturan herkes, ön veya arka kapınızı açın veya pencerelerinizden dışarı bakın. Eğer bir dakika sonra herkes evinden dışarıya bakarsa, kaçak artık kaçamaz. Hazır mıyız?
tr_results: "title": "The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo", "author": "Stieg Larsson"
es: —La policía sugiere a toda la población del sector Terrace que haga lo siguiente: en todas las casas de todas las calles, todo el mundo debe abrir la puerta delantera o trasera o mirar por una ventana. El fugitivo no podrá escapar si, durante el minuto siguiente, todo el Mundo mira desde el exterior de su casa. ¡Preparados!
vi_translation: "The police request that all residents in the Elm Terrace area do the following: Each person in each house on each street should open a front or back door or look out a window. The fugitive will not be able to escape if, in one minute, everyone looks out of their house, ready!" Of course!
tr_translation: “The police are asking all the residents of the Elm Terrace area to do the following. Everyone in every house on all the streets, open your front or back doors or look out your windows. If everyone looks outside from their homes in a minute, the fugitive will no longer be able to escape. Are we ready?”
es_translation: —The police suggest that all the residents of the Terrace sector do the following: in every house on every street, everyone should open the front or back door or look out a window. The fugitive will not be able to escape if, during the next minute, everyone looks from outside their house. Ready!
st: Mapolesa a fana ka maikutlo a baahi bohle sebakeng sa Elm Terrace ba etsa ka tsela e latelang: E mong le e mong ka tlung e 'ngoe le e' ngoe seterateng se seng le se seng se bula monyako o ka pele kapa o ka morao kapa o shebile lifensetereng. Mophaphathehi a ke ke a phonyoha haeba motho e mong le e mong motsotsong o latelang a sheba ntlo ea hae. E loketse! “
yo: "Awọn ọlọpa daba pe gbogbo olugbe ni agbegbe Elm Terrace ṣe bi atẹle: Gbogbo eniyan ni gbogbo ile ni gbogbo ita ṣii ẹnu-ọna iwaju tabi ẹhin tabi wo lati awọn window. Ẹni tí ó sá lọ kò lè sá tí gbogbo ènìyàn ní ìṣẹ́jú tó tẹ̀lé bá wo ilé rẹ̀. Ṣetan! “
tn: Mapodise a re batho botlhe mo kgaolong ya Elm Terrace ba dira jaana: Mongwe le mongwe mo ntlong nngwe le nngwe mo mmileng mongwe le mongwe o bula lebati le le kwa pele kgotsa kwa morago kgotsa go leba go tswa mo difensetereng. Motho ga a ka ke a kgona go falola fa mongwe le mongwe a le mo metsotsong e e latelang a lebile ntlo ya gagwe. Ready Set Go ! “
ty: " Te horo'a nei te mau ve'a i te mana'o no te huiraatira taatoa no te tuhaa fenua no Elm Terrace: E iriti te mau taata atoa i roto i te mau fare atoa i roto i te mau aroa atoa i te hoê opani i mua aore râ i muri aore râ e hi'o atu na roto i te mau haamaramarama. Eita te taata horo ê e nehenehe e horo mai te peu e e hi'o te mau taata atoa i roto i te minuti i muri iho i to ' na fare. Ua ineine! “
mai: "पुलिसक सुझाव अछि जे एल्म टेरेस क्षेत्रक पूरा आबादी निम्नानुसार काज करैत अछि: प्रत्येक गलीमे प्रत्येक घरमे सभ गोटे आगू वा पाछूक दरवाजा खोलैत छथि वा खिड़कीसँ देखैत छथि। भगोड़ा तखन भागि नहि सकैत अछि जँ अगिला मिनटमे सभ गोटे अपन घरसँ देखैत छथि। तैयार! “
mg: "Manoro hevitra ny polisy fa ny mponina rehetra ao amin'ny faritra Elm Terrace dia manao toy izao manaraka izao: Ny olona rehetra ao amin'ny trano tsirairay eny an-dalambe dia manokatra varavarana aloha na aoriana na mijery avy amin'ny varavarankely. Tsy afa-mandositra ny mpandositra raha mijery ny tranony ny olona rehetra amin'ny minitra manaraka. Vonona! “
dv: "އެލްމް ޓެރެސް ސަރަހައްދުގެ މުޅި އާބާދީ މިގޮތަށް ކުރާ ކަމަށް ފުލުހުން ލަފާދެނީ: ކޮންމެ މަގެއްގެ ކޮންމެ ގެއެއްގައި ތިބި ކޮންމެ މީހަކު ވެސް ކުރިމަތީގައި ނުވަތަ ފަހަތު ދޮރެއް ނުވަތަ ބިއްލޫރިތަކުން ބަލާލަނީ. ފިލައިގެން އުޅޭ މީހާއަށް ފިލައިގެން ނުދެވޭނެ ޖެހިގެން އަންނަ މިނެޓުގައި އެންމެން ވެސް އޭނާގެ ގެއިން ބަލައިލިޔަސް އެވެ. ތައްޔާރު! “

en: He floated on his back when the valise filled and sank; the river was mild and leisurely, going away from the people who ate shadows for breakfast and steam for lunch and vapours for supper. The river was very real; it held him comfortably and gave him the time at last, the leisure, to consider this month, this year, and a lifetime of years. He listened to his heart slow. His thoughts stopped rushing with his blood.
vi: Anh nằm ngửa mà trôi khi chiếc va li đầy nước và chìm; dòng sông dịu và thư thả, rời xa khỏi nhũng người ăn sáng bằng những cái bóng, ăn trưa bằng hơi nước và ăn tối bằng khói. Dòng sông rất thực; nó nhẹ đưa anh đi và rốt cuộc cũng cho anh có được thì giờ, có được sự thư nhàn để suy xét về tháng này, về cái năm này, về bao năm của một đòi người. Anh lắng nghe tim mình đập khẽ. Ý nghĩ của anh thôi không còn tuôn gấp cùng với máu anh.
tr: Valiz suyla dolup batarken, suda sırtüstü ilerlerken nehir uysal ve tembeldi ve onu, kahvaltılarında gölgeler, öğle yemeklerinde buhar ve akşam yemeklerinde buğu yiyen insanlardan uzaklaştırıyordu. Nehir çok gerçekti; onu rahatlattı ve sonunda ona serbestliği, bu ayı, bu yılı, bir ömrü dolduran yılları düşünme fırsatını verdi. Kalbindeki çarpıntıların azalışını dinledi. Damarlarındaki kan hızlandıkça, düşünceleri durdu.
es: Cuando la maleta se llenó de agua y se hundió, Montag siguió flotando boca arriba; el río era tranquilo y pausado, mientras se alejaba de la gente que comía sombras para desayunar, humo para almorzar y vapores para cenar. El río era muy real, le sostenía cómodamente y le daba tiempo para considerar este mes, este año, y todo un transcurso de ellos. Montag escuchó el lento latir de su corazón. Sus pensamientos dejaron de correr junto con su sangre.
vi_translation: He lay on his back and floated as the suitcase filled with water and sank; the river was gentle and leisurely, drifting away from those who ate breakfast with shadows, lunch with steam, and dinner with smoke. The river was very real; it gently carried him along and ultimately gave him time, the leisure to reflect on this month, this year, and the many years of a lifetime. He listened to his heart beating softly. His thoughts no longer rushed along with his blood.
tr_translation: As the suitcase filled with water and sank, while floating on his back in the water, the river was gentle and lazy, and it was taking him away from the people who ate shadows for breakfast, steam for lunch, and mist for dinner. The river was very real; it relaxed him and finally gave him the opportunity to think about freedom, this month, this year, the years that filled a lifetime. He listened to the decrease in the palpitations in his heart. As the blood in his veins sped up, his thoughts stopped.
es_translation: When the suitcase filled with water and sank, Montag continued floating face up; the river was calm and slow, as he drifted away from the people who ate shadows for breakfast, smoke for lunch, and vapors for dinner. The river was very real, it held him comfortably and gave him time to consider this month, this year, and a whole passage of them. Montag listened to the slow beating of his heart. His thoughts stopped running along with his blood.
st: 'Me o ile a phalla ka mor'a hore a khutlele ka mor'a hae, 'me o ne a tletse le ho thothomela; Noka e ne e le bonolo ebile e phomola, e baleha batho ba neng ba ja meriti bakeng sa lijo tsa hoseng le mouoane bakeng sa lijo tsa mots'eare le vapours bakeng sa lijo tsa mantsiboea. Nōka e ne e le ea sebele; E ile ea mo tšoara ka boiketlo 'me ea mo fa nako ea ho qetela, boikhathollo, ho nahana ka khoeli ena, selemong sena le bophelo bohle ba lilemo. 'Me o ile a mamela pelo ea hae butle-butle. Maikutlo a hae a ile a emisa ho potlakela ka mali a hae.
yo: Ó fò lórí ẹ̀yìn rẹ̀ nígbà tí valise náà kún tí ó sì rì; odò náà rọrùn ó sì ní ìsinmi, ó ń lọ kúrò lọ́dọ̀ àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n jẹ òjìji fún oúnjẹ àárọ̀ àti nya fún oúnjẹ ọ̀sán àti vapours fún oúnjẹ alẹ́. odo naa jẹ gidigidi gidi; Ó mú un ní ìrọ̀rùn ó sì fún un ní àkókò nígbẹ̀yìn, ìsinmi, láti ronú oṣù yìí, ọdún yìí, àti ìgbésí ayé ọdún. Ó tẹ́tí sí ọkàn rẹ̀ lọ́ra. Èrò ọkàn rẹ̀ dáwọ́ sáré pẹ̀lú ẹ̀jẹ̀ rẹ̀ dúró.
tn: O ne a le mo tseleng e e neng e le mo tseleng e e neng e tletse le go tswa mo go yone. Noka e ne e le bonolo e bile e ikhutse, e tswa kgakala le batho ba ba neng ba ja meriti ya dijo tsa mo mosong le go ya go ja dijo tsa motshegare. Noka e ne e le ya nnete; O ne a mo gomotsa mme a mo naya nako ya bofelo, boitapoloso, go sekaseka kgwedi eno, monongwaga le botshelo jwa dingwaga. A utlwa pelo ya gagwe e bonya. Megopolo ya gagwe e ne ya emisa go itlhaganedisa ka madi a gagwe.
ty: Ua painu oia i ni'a i to'na tua a î ai e a tomo ai te pereoo ; e mea mărû e te au maitai te anavai, ma te faaatea ê ia ratou i te mau taata e amu ra i te maa i te po'ipo'i e te au auahi no te tamaaraa i te avatea e te mau matini no te tamaaraa i te pô. E mea mau te anavai; na te reira i tape'a ia'na e ua horo'a ia'na i te taime hopea, te faafaaearaa, no te feruri i teie ava'e, i teie matahiti, e i te hoê oraraa taatoa. Ua faaroo mărû noa oia i to'na aau. Ua faaea to 'na mau mana'o i te tahe i roto i to'na toto.
mai: जखन वैलिस भरि गेल आ डूबि गेल तखन ओ अपन पीठ पर तैर गेलाह। नदी हल्लुक आ इत्मीनान सँ छल, जे ओहि लोकसँ दूर चलि रहल छल जे नाश्ताक लेल छाया खाइत छल आ दुपहरक भोजन लेल भाप आ रात्रिभोजक लेल वाष्प खाइत छल। नदी बहुत वास्तविक छल। ई हुनका आराम सँ पकड़ि लेलक आ अंततः हुनका समय देलक, अवकाश, एहि महीना, एहि साल, आ जीवनभर साल पर विचार करबाक लेल। ओ अपन हृदयक बात धीरे-धीरे सुनि लेलक। ओकर विचार खून सं दौड़नाइ बंद कए देलक।
mg: Nitsingevana teo amin'ny lamosiny izy rehefa feno sy rendrika ny valise; Malefaka sy miala voly ilay renirano, miala amin'ireo olona izay nihinana aloka ho an'ny sakafo maraina sy entona ho an'ny sakafo atoandro sy ny oram-batravatra ho an'ny sakafo hariva. Tena nisy ilay renirano; Nitazona azy tamim-pilaminana izany ary nanome azy fotoana tamin'ny farany, ny fialam-boly, mba handinika ity volana ity, amin'ity taona ity, ary mandritra ny androm-piainany. Nihaino ny fony miadana izy. Nitsahatra tsy nihazakazaka niaraka tamin'ny rany ny eritreriny.
dv: އެކަލޭގެފާނުގެ ފުރަގަހުގައި އެކަލޭގެފާނު އޮޔާދިޔައެވެ. އެހިނދު، އެކަލޭގެފާނުގެ ހިތްޕުޅަށް އެ ވަޅުތައް ފުރި، އަޑިއަށް ހިނގައްޖެއެވެ. ހެނދުނުގެ ނާސްތާއަށް ހިޔަނި ކާ މީހުންނާއި މެންދުރުގެ ކެއުމަށް ސްޓީމް އަދި ރޭގަނޑުގެ ކެއުމަށް ބޭނުންވާ ސާމާނު ކާ މީހުންނާ ދުރަށް ދިޔަ ކޯރަކީ މަޑުމައިތިރި ކޯރެކެވެ. އެ ކޯރަކީ ވަރަށް ހަގީގީ ކޯރެކެވެ. ފަހެ، އެކަލޭގެފާނު އެކަލޭގެފާނުގެ އަރިހުގައި ހިފަހައްޓައިގެން ހުންނެވިއެވެ. އަދި އެކަލޭގެފާނަށް، މިމަހާއި، މިއަހަރާއި، މުޅި އުމުރުގެ އަހަރުތަކާމެދު ވިސްނައި، އެކަލޭގެފާނަށް ފުރުޞަތު ދެއްވިއެވެ. އޭނާގެ ހިތުގެ އަޑު މަޑުމަޑުން އަޑުއަހަމުން ދިޔައެވެ. އޭނާގެ ޚިޔާލުތައް އޭނާގެ ލޭގެ ސަބަބުން އަވަސްވުން ހުއްޓުނެވެ.

en: In the morning he would not have needed sleep, for all the warm odours and sights of a complete country night would have rested and slept him while his eyes were wide and his mouth, when he thought to test it, was half a smile.
vi: Buổi sáng anh hẳn không cần ngủ, vì tất cả những mùi thơm ấm áp và cảnh đêm miền quê viên mãn hẳn đã giúp anh được yên ngủ trong khi mắt anh vẫn mở và miệng anh, khi anh nghĩ đến chuyện kiểm tra nó xem sao, đang hơi mỉm cười.
tr: Kır gecesinin bütün sıcak koku ve görüntülerinin onu dinlendirmiş olduğundan ve gözleri apaçık ve ağzı, sınamak için düşündüğünde, yarı gülümser bir şekilde onu uyuttuğundan, sabah uykuya ihtiyaç duymayacaktı.
es: Por la mañana no hubiese tenido sueño, porque todos los cálidos olores y las visiones de una noche completa en el campo le hubiesen descansado aunque sus ojos hubieran permanecido abiertos, y su boca, cuando se le ocurrió pensar en ella, mostraba una leve sonrisa.
es_results: "title": "Don Quijote de la Mancha", "author": "Miguel de Cervantes"
vi_translation: In the morning, he surely didn't need to sleep, because all the warm scents and the fulfilled night scenery of the countryside must have helped him sleep peacefully while his eyes were still open and his mouth, when he thought about checking it, was slightly smiling.
tr_translation: Since the warm scents and sights of the countryside night had relaxed him, and his eyes were wide open and his mouth, when he thought to test it, was half-smiling as it lulled him to sleep, he would not need sleep in the morning.
es_translation: In the morning, he wouldn't have been sleepy, because all the warm smells and visions of a whole night in the countryside would have rested him even if his eyes had remained open, and his mouth, when he thought about it, showed a slight smile.

en: This was all he wanted now. Some sign that the immense world would accept him and give him the long time needed to think all the things that must be thought.
vi: Lúc này anh chỉ cần có thế. Vài dấu hiệu rằng thế giới mênh mông sẽ chấp nhận anh và cho anh khoảng thời gian dài cần thiết để nghĩ cho rốt ráo tất cả những gì phải nghĩ.
tr: Şu an bütün istediği bunlardı. Bu kocaman dünyanın onu kabul edip, düşünülmesi gereken her şeyi düşünebilmesi için gereken o uzun zamanı ona vereceğine dair bir gösterge.
es: Aquello era todo lo que deseaba. Algún signo de que el inmenso mundo le aceptaría y le concedería todo el tiempo que necesitaba para pensar lo que debía ser pensado.
vi_translation: At this moment, that's all he needed. A few signs that the vast world would accept him and give him the long time necessary to thoroughly think through everything he needed to think about.
tr_translation: All he wanted right now was these. An indication that this huge world would accept him and give him the long time needed to think about everything that needed to be considered.
es_translation: That was all he desired. Some sign that the immense world would accept him and grant him all the time he needed to think what needed to be thought.
st: Sena ke sona feela seo a neng a se batla ha jwale. Ba bang ba supa hore lefatše le leholo le ne le tla mo amohela le ho mo fa nako e telele e hlokahalang ho nahana lintho tsohle tse lokelang ho nahanoa.
yo: Gbogbo ohun tí ó fẹ́ báyìí nìyẹn. Àwọn kan fi àmì hàn pé ayé ńlá yóò gbà á kí ó sì fún un ní ìgbà pípẹ́ tí ó nílò láti ronú nípa gbogbo nkan tí a gbọ́dọ̀ rò.
tn: Ena ke yona fela se a neng a se batla. Ba bangwe ba re lefatshe le le nang le lone le tla mo amogela le go mo naya nako e telele go akanya dilo tsotlhe tse di tshwanetseng go akanngwa.

en: A deer. He smelled the heavy musk-like perfume mingled with blood and the gummed exhalation of the animal's breath, all cardamon and moss and ragweed odour in this huge night where the trees ran at him, pulled away, ran, pulled away, to the pulse of the heart behind his eyes.
vi: Một con hươu. Anh ngửi thấy mùi xạ hăng hắc như nước hoa pha lẫn máu và mùi hơi thở dinh dính của con vật, mùi bạch đậu khấu, mùi rêu, mùi cỏ lưỡi chó trong đêm tối khổng lồ này nơi cây cối chạy ùa vào anh, lùi lại, chạy tới, lùi lại, thuận theo nhịp tim đằng sau cặp mắt anh.
tr: Bir geyik. Montag miskle kan karışımı kokusunu ve hayvanın yapışkan solumasını hissetti; kakule, yosun, ot kokulu bu muazzam gecede bütün ağaçlar, gözlerinin ardındaki kalp atışlarına bağlı olarak üstüne gelirken, kenara çekilip üstüne gelirken, çekilip gelirken.
es: Un gamo. Montag olió el denso perfume almizclado y el olor a hierba del aliento del animal, en aquella noche eterna en que los árboles parecían correr hacia él, apartarse, correr, apartarse, al impulso de los latidos de su corazón.
vi_translation: A deer. He smelled the pungent musk like a mixture of perfume and blood, and the sticky breath of the animal, the scent of cardamom, moss, and dog tongue grass in this vast night where the trees rushed towards him, retreated, rushed forward, retreated, in rhythm with the heartbeat behind his eyes.
tr_translation: A deer. Montag felt the mixed scent of musk and blood and the sticky breathing of the animal; in this immense night scented with cardamom, moss, and grass, all the trees seemed to come at him, retreating and advancing, tied to the heartbeat behind his eyes.
es_translation: A deer. Montag smelled the dense musky perfume and the scent of grass from the animal's breath, on that eternal night when the trees seemed to run towards him, move away, run, move away, driven by the beating of his heart.
st: Like a deer. 'Me o ile a nkha nkhang hamonate e boima musk-joaloka nkhang hamonate tsoakane le mali le gummed exhalation tsa phefumoloho ea phoofolo, tsohle cardamon le moss le ralwaed monko o monate bosiung bona bo boholo boo lifate li ileng tsa matha ho eena, hula, a matha, a fosoa, ho pulse ea pelo ka mor'a mahlo a hae.

tn: A deer bone O ne a nkga monkgo o o bokete jaaka monkgo o o bokete o o tswakilweng ka madi, o ne o tshikinya phefumoloho ya phologolo, lotlhe ka cardamone le mose le monko o monate mo bosigong jo bo boitshegang jo ditlhare di neng di bo di tabogela kwa go ene, di tabogela, tsa tabogela, tsa gogela kwa godimo ga pelo ya gagwe kwa morago ga matlho a gagwe.

en: He stood breathing, and the more he breathed the land in, the more he was filled up with all the details of the land. He was not empty. There was more than enough here to fill him. There would always be more than enough.
en_results: "title": "The Brief Wondrous Life of Oscar Wao", "author": "Junot Díaz"
vi: Anh đứng thở, và càng hít mảnh đất này vào, trong anh càng đầy ngập mọi chi tiết của đất này. Anh không rỗng. Ở đây có quá đủ thứ để lấp đầy anh. Luôn luôn không chỉ đủ mà nhiều hơn cả đủ.
vi_results: "title": "The Old Man and the Sea", "author": "Ernest Hemingway"
tr: Nefes almak için durdu, ne kadar çok nefes alırsa, toprağın havasını o kadar içine çekiyor ve toprağın ayrıntılarıyla daha fazla doluyordu. Boş değildi. Burada onu yeterince dolduracak kadar çok şey vardı. Her zaman da yeterinden fazla olacaktı.
es: Se irguió jadeante, y cuanto más inspiraba el perfume de la tierra, más lleno se sentía de todos sus detalles. No estaba vacío. Allí había más de lo necesario para llenarle. Siempre habría más que suficiente.
vi_translation: He stood breathing, and the more he inhaled this land, the more he was filled with every detail of it. He was not empty. There was more than enough here to fill him. Always not just enough but more than enough.
tr_translation: He paused to take a breath; the more he breathed, the more he inhaled the air of the earth and filled himself with its details. He was not empty. There was enough here to fill him adequately. There would always be more than enough.
es_translation: He stood up panting, and the more he inhaled the scent of the earth, the more he felt filled with all its details. He was not empty. There was more than enough there to fill him. There would always be more than enough.
st: O ile a ema a hema, 'me ha a ntse a phefumoloha naha, ha a ntse a tlala haholoanyane ka lintlha tsohle tsa naha. O ne a se na letho. Ho ne ho e-na le tse fetang mona ho mo tlatsa. Kamehla ho na le tse fetang tse lekaneng.
yo: Ó dúró ní mímí, bẹ́ẹ̀ ni ó ṣe ń mí ilẹ̀ náà sí i, bẹ́ẹ̀ ni gbogbo àlàyé ilẹ̀ náà ṣe kún un. Kò ṣófo. Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ nkan ló wà níbí láti kún un. Ó máa tó ní gbogbo ìgbà.
tn: O ne a simolola go hema, mme fa a ne a hema, mme fa a ne a le mo lefatsheng, fa a ne a tlala thata ka dintlha tsotlhe tsa lefatshe. Ne se ne frega. Go ne go na le tse di fetang fano gore di tle di mo tlale. Go tla bo go na le sengwe se se fetang ka metlha.
ty: Ua ti'a noa oia ma te huti i te aho, e rahi noa'tu to'na hutiraa aho i te fenua, rahi noa'toa'tu to'na îraa i te mau mea rii tumu o te fenua. E ere oia i te taata ore. Ua hau atu i te nava'i i ô nei no te faaî ia'na. E hau atu â i te mau taime atoa.

en: Half an hour later, cold, and moving carefully on the tracks, fully aware of his entire body, his face, his mouth, his eyes stuffed with blackness, his ears stuffed with sound, his legs prickled with burrs and nettles, he saw the fire ahead.
vi: Nửa giờ sau, lạnh, bước đi cẩn thận trên đường ray, ý thức rõ về toàn bộ thân thể mình, mặt anh, miệng anh, mắt anh đầy ứ bóng tối, tai anh đầy ứ âm thanh, chân anh ngứa ran vì bị quả ké và tầm ma đâm, anh thấy đằng trước có ngọn lửa.
vi_results: "title": "Book name: The Lord of the Rings", "author": "J.R.R. Tolkien"
tr: Yarım saat sonra, üşümüş bir halde dikkatle yol boyunca ilerlerken bütün vücudunun, yüzünün, ağzının ve gözlerinin karanlıkla kulaklarının seslerle dolduğunu; bacaklarının dikenli çalılar ve ısırganlar tarafından çizik içinde olduğunu hissediyordu ve birden ilerideki ateşi gördü.
tr_results: "title": "Book name unknown", "author": "Yazılma yılı bilinmiyor, ancak benzer tarza sahip yazarlar arasında Orhan Kemal, Aziz Nesin, Sabahattin Ali gibi isimler öne çıkıyor, ancak kesin bir isim vermek zor."
es: Media hora más tarde, frío, moviéndose cuidadosamente por la vía, bien consciente de su propio cuerpo de su rostro, de su boca, con los ojos llenos de negrura, los oídos llenos de sonidos, sus piernas cubiertas de briznas y de ortigas, vio un fuego ante él.
vi_translation: Half an hour later, cold, walking carefully on the railway tracks, fully aware of his entire body, his face, his mouth, his eyes filled with darkness, his ears filled with sound, his legs tingling from being pricked by burrs and nettles, he saw a fire ahead.
tr_translation: Half an hour later, as he carefully moved along the road in a cold state, he felt that his entire body, face, mouth, and eyes were filled with darkness and his ears with sounds; his legs were scratched by thorny bushes and nettles, and suddenly he saw the fire ahead.
es_translation: Half an hour later, cold, moving carefully along the track, well aware of his own body, his face, his mouth, with eyes full of darkness, ears full of sounds, his legs covered in blades of grass and nettles, he saw a fire before him.
st: Halofo ea hora hamorao, e batang, e batang le ho tsamaea ka hloko litselaneng, e tseba ka botlalo 'mele oa hae kaofela, sefahleho sa hae, molomo oa hae, mahlo a hae a tletse botšo, litsebe tsa hae li benya ka molumo, maoto a hae a pricked ka burrs le nettles, o ile a bona mollo o ka pele.
yo: Ìdajì wákàtí kan lẹ́yìn náà, òtútù, ó sì ń rìn dáadáa lórí àwọn ọ̀nà, ó mọ̀ ní kíkún nípa gbogbo ara rẹ̀, ojú rẹ̀, ẹnu rẹ̀, ojú rẹ̀ kún fún dúdú, etí rẹ̀ kún fún ohùn, ẹsẹ̀ rẹ̀ kún fún burrs àti nettles, ó rí iná náà níwájú.
tn: Morago ga ura, go tsididi le go tsamaya ka kelotlhoko mo tseleng, a itse ka botlalo mmele otlhe, sefatlhego sa gagwe, molomo wa gagwe, matlho a gagwe a ne a tletse bontsho, ditsebe tsa gagwe di tshwentswe ka modumo, maoto a gagwe a fefogile ka di-burrs le nettles, a bona molelo o o kwa pele.
ty: Hoê afa hora i muri a'e, te toetoe, e te tere - maitai - raa na nia i te e'a auri, ma te ite maitai i to ' na tino taatoa, to ' na hoho'a mata, to ' na vaha, to ' na mata î i te ereere, to ' na tari'a tei î i te ta'i, to ' na nau avae tei î i te mau oru e te mau raau taratara, ua ite oia i te auahi i mua ia ' na.

en: The innocent man stood bewildered, a cigarette burning in his hand. He stared at the Hound, not knowing what it was. He probably never knew. He glanced up at the sky and the wailing sirens. The cameras rushed down. The Hound leapt up into the air with a rhythm and a sense of timing that was incredibly beautiful. Its needle shot out. It was suspended for a moment in their gaze, as if to give the vast audience time to appreciate everything, the raw look of the victim's face, the empty street, the steel animal a bullet nosing the target.
vi: Người đàn ông vô tội đứng đó hoang mang, tay cầm điếu thuốc đang cháy dở. Anh ta nhìn chăm chăm con Chó Máy, không biết nó là gì. Có lẽ anh ta sẽ không bao giờ biết. Anh ta nhìn lên trời, nơi còi đang hụ inh ỏi. Camera lao xuống. Chó Máy nhảy phóc lên không trung với tiết điệu và sự tính toán thời gian vô cùng đẹp. Kim của nó bắn ra. Cái kim treo đó một thoáng trong cái nhìn của họ, như để cho đám khán giả đông đúc kia có đủ thì giờ thấu cảm mọi thứ, cái vẻ rất ư là thật của khuôn mặt nạn nhân, con phố vắng, con vật bằng thép như viên đạn đang thò mũi ngửi con mồi.
tr: Elinde yanan bir sigara olan suçsuz adam şaşkın bir şekilde durdu. Ne olduğunu bilmeden Tazı’ya baktı. Belki de hiç bilmemişti. Gökyüzüne ve öten sirenlere baktı. Kameralar ona doğru yaklaştı. Tazı, inanılmaz güzellikte bir ritim ve zamanlamayla havaya fırladı. İğnesi dışarı çıktı, sanki izleyicilerin her şeyi, kurbanın yüzündeki acı ifadeyi, boş sokağı, hedefine çarpacak bir kurşun gibi ilerleyen çelik hayvanı görebilmeleri için bir an havada asılı kaldı.
es: El inocente permaneció atónito; un cigarrillo ardía en una de sus manos. Se quedó mirando al Sabueso, sin saber qué era aquello. Probablemente, nunca llegó a saberlo. Levantó la mirada hacia el cielo y hacia el sonido de las sirenas. Las cámaras se precipitaron hacia el suelo. El Sabueso saltó en el aire con un ritmo y una precisión que resultaban increíblemente bellos. Su aguja asomó. Permaneció inmóvil un momento, como para dar al inmenso público tiempo para apreciarlo todo: la mirada de terror en el rostro de la víctima, la calle vacía, el animal de acero, semejante a un proyectil alcanzando el blanco.
vi_translation: The innocent man stood there bewildered, holding a half-burnt cigarette. He stared at the Robot Dog, not knowing what it was. Perhaps he would never know. He looked up at the sky, where the sirens were blaring loudly. The camera swooped down. The Robot Dog leaped into the air with an incredibly graceful rhythm and timing. Its needle shot out. The needle hung there for a moment in their gaze, as if to give the large audience enough time to fully grasp everything, the very real expression on the victim's face, the empty street, the steel creature like a bullet sniffing its prey.
tr_translation: The innocent man with a burning cigarette in his hand stood in shock. He looked at the Hound without knowing what was happening. Perhaps he had never known. He looked at the sky and the blaring sirens. The cameras approached him. The Hound leaped into the air with incredible rhythm and timing. Its needle extended, as if it hung in the air for a moment so the audience could see everything: the pained expression on the victim's face, the empty street, the steel animal advancing like a bullet towards its target.
es_translation: The innocent man remained astonished; a cigarette burned in one of his hands. He stood staring at the Hound, not knowing what it was. He probably never came to know. He looked up at the sky and towards the sound of the sirens. The cameras plummeted to the ground. The Hound leaped into the air with a rhythm and precision that were incredibly beautiful. Its needle protruded. It remained still for a moment, as if to give the immense audience time to take it all in: the look of terror on the victim's face, the empty street, the steel animal, like a projectile hitting its target.
st: Monna ea se nang molato o ne a ntse a le har'a batho ba bangata, 'me ho ne ho sekerete se tukang ka letsohong la hae. O ile a sheba ka hare ho kereke, a sa tsebe hore na ke eng. Mohlomong o ne a sa tsebe. 'Me o ile a bona leholimong le li-sirens tsa bona. Likhamera li ile tsa oa. The Hound o ile a kena moeeng ka morethetho le kutloisiso ea nako e neng e le ntle ka mokhoa o makatsang. Ho ho ho the needle shot. E ile ea emisoa motsotsoana gazeeng ea bona, joalo ka ha eka ho fa bamameli nako e kholo ea ho ananela ntho e ngoe le e ngoe, ponahalo e tala ea sefahleho sa lehlatsipa, seterata se se nang letho, phoofolo ea tšepe e nyenyefatsa sepheo.
yo: Ọkùnrin aláìṣẹ̀ náà dúró ní ìdàrúdàpọ̀, sìgá tí ó ń jó ní ọwọ́ rẹ̀. Ó tẹjú mọ́ Hound, kò mọ ohun tí ó jẹ́. Ó ṣe é ṣe kí ó má mọ̀ rí. Ó wo ọ̀run àti àwọn ìró tí ó ń ṣàìsàn. Àwọn kámẹ́rà náà sáré sọ̀kalẹ̀. Hound fò sókè sínú afẹ́fẹ́ pẹ̀lú ìlànà àti ìmọ̀lára àkókò tí ó rẹwà gan-an. Abẹ́rẹ́ rẹ̀ yìnbọn jáde. Wọ́n dá a dúró fún ìgbà díẹ̀ ní ojú wọn, bí ẹni pé láti fún ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn olùwòran ní àkókò láti mọrírì gbogbo nkan, ìrísí ojú ẹni tí ó ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀

ty: Te ti'a noa ra teie taata hara ore ma te taa ore, e avaava e ama ra i roto i to'na rima. Ua hi'o noa oia i te feti'a, ma te ite ore e, eaha râ te reira. Aita paha oia i ite. Ua hi'o oia i te ra'i e te mau pu. Ua topa te mau pata hoho'a. Ua ou'a a'era te Hound i roto i te aore ma te hoê tairiraa e te hoê mana'o e mea nehenehe mau te taime. Ua paapaa roa to ' na nira. Ua tapeahia te reira no te hoê taime i roto i to ratou mata, mai te mea ra e e horoa ratou i te taime no te feia rahi e faaroo ra no te haafaufaa i te mau mea atoa, te hoho'a mata o te taata i roohia i te ati, te aroâ taata ore, te animala auri i te hoê ofai pupuhi e ofai pupuhi to nia iho.
mai: निर्दोष आदमी चकित भऽ कऽ ठाढ़ भऽ गेल, हाथमे सिगरेट जरैत छल। ओ हाउंड दिस ताकैत रहलाह, नहि जनैत छलाह जे ई की छल। ओ शायद कहियो नहि जनैत छलाह। ओ आकाश आ विलाप करय बला सायरन दिस देखलक। कैमरा दौड़ि गेल। हाउंड एकटा लय आ समयक भावनाक सङ्ग हवामे उछलल जे अविश्वसनीय रूपसँ सुन्दर छल। ओकर सुई बाहर निकलि गेल। एकरा हुनका सभक नजरिमे एक क्षणक लेल स्थगित कऽ देल गेल, जेना विशाल दर्शककेँ सब किछुक सराहना करबाक लेल समय देल जाय, पीड़ितक चेहराक कच्चा रूप, खाली सड़क, स्टीलक जानवर एकटा गोली जे लक्ष्यकेँ नोक दैत अछि।
mg: Nitsangana ilay lehilahy tsy manan-tsiny, ary nisy sigara nirehitra teny an-tanany. Nibanjina ny Hound izy, nefa tsy fantany hoe inona ilay izy. Azo inoana fa tsy fantany mihitsy. Nibanjina ny lanitra sy ny anjombona izy. Nidina haingana ny fakantsary. Nitsambikina teny amin'ny rivotra ny Hound niaraka tamin'ny gadona sy ny fahatsapana fotoana izay tena tsara tarehy. Nipoaka ny fanjaitrany. Naato nandritra ny fotoana fohy teo amin'ny fijerin'izy ireo izany, toy ny hoe hanome fotoana ho an'ny mpijery marobe mba hankasitrahana ny zava-drehetra, ny endrika manta amin'ny endrik'ilay niharam-boina, ny arabe tsy misy na inona na inona, ny biby vy ho bala manondro ny lasibatra.

en: “If not, we'll just have to wait. We'll pass the books on to our children, by word of mouth, and let our children wait, in turn, on the other people. A lot will be lost that way, of course.
vi: "Nếu họ không nghe, chúng ta đành phải đợi. Chúng ta sẽ trao sách lại cho con cái, bằng truyền miệng, rồi đến lượt con cái ta sẽ tiếp tục đại để trao lại cho người khác. Dĩ nhiên cách ấy thì sẽ mất mát nhiều.
tr: “Eğer dinlemezlerse sadece beklememiz gerek. Kitapları ağızdan ağıza çocuklarımıza aktarırız ve bundan sonra çocuklarımız da bekler ve başkalarına aktarırlar. Elbette bu şekilde birçoğu kaybolur.
tr_results: "title": "Book name: The Little Prince", "author": "Antoine de Saint-Exupéry"
es: —Si no lo hacen, no tendremos más que esperar. Transmitiremos los libros a nuestros hijos, oralmente, y dejaremos que nuestros hijos esperen, a su vez. De este modo, se perderá mucho, desde luego, pero no se puede obligar a la gente a que escuche.
vi_translation: "If they don't listen, we will have to wait. We will pass the books on to our children, by word of mouth, and then our children will continue to pass them on to others. Of course, that way there will be a lot of loss.
tr_translation: "If they don't listen, we just have to wait. We pass the books from mouth to mouth to our children, and then our children wait and pass them on to others. Of course, many will be lost this way.
es_translation: —If they don't do it, we will have no choice but to wait. We will pass the books to our children, orally, and let our children wait, in turn. In this way, much will be lost, of course, but you cannot force people to listen.
st: "Haeba ho se joalo, re tla tlameha feela ho ema. Re tla fetisetsa libuka ho bana ba rona, ka lentsoe la molomo, 'me re lumelle bana ba rona hore ba lete, ka lehlakoreng le leng, ho batho ba bang. Ho na le lintho tse ngata tse lahlehileng ka tsela ena, ehlile.
yo: "Ti kii ba ṣe bẹ, a yoo ni lati duro nikan. A máa gbé àwọn ìwé náà lé àwọn ọmọ wa lọ́wọ́, nípa ọ̀rọ̀ ẹnu, a sì máa jẹ́ kí àwọn ọmọ wa dúró, lẹ́yìn náà, lórí àwọn ènìyàn yòókù. Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ nkan ni yóò sọnù báyẹn, dájúdájú.
tn: 'Fa o sa dire jalo, o tlaa tshwanêlwa ke go leta' - If we will have to waits Re tla fetisetsa dibuka go bana ba rona, ka lefoko la molomo, mme a bana ba rona ba lete bana ba rona gore ba lete batho ba bangwe. Bontsi bo tlile go latlhega jalo.

en: “The look of you's enough. You haven't seen yourself in a mirror lately. Beyond that, the city has never cared so much about us to bother with an elaborate chase like this to find us. A few crackpots with verses in their heads can't touch them, and they know it and we know it; everyone knows it. So long as the vast population doesn't wander about quoting the Magna Charta and the Constitution, it's all right. The firemen were enough to check that, now and then. No, the cities don't bother us. And you look like hell.”
vi: "Nhìn cái vẻ của anh là đủ. Dạo gần đây anh không soi gưong. Ngoài ra, thành phố này chưa bao giờ bận tâm đến chúng tôi nhiều đến mức bỏ công làm một cuộc săn đuổi kỳ công như thế đặng tìm chúng tôi. Vài ba thằng cha hâm hấp trong đầu toàn thơ với thẩn thì không thể đụng tới họ, họ biết thế mà chúng tôi cũng biết thế; ai cũng biết thế. Chừng nào đa phần thiên hạ còn chưa đi khắp chốn mà trích dẫn Đại Hiến chương Anh quốc hay Hiến pháp Hoa Kỳ thì sẽ chẳng sao cả. Có các lính phóng hỏa để thi thoảng kiểm tra chuyện đó là đủ rồi. Không, các thành phố họ chả quan tâm tới bọn tôi. Còn anh thì bộ dạng mới kinh chứ."
tr: “Sana bir bakmak bile yetiyor. Son zamanlarda kendini aynada hiç görmedin? Ayrıca şehir hiçbir zaman bize aldırmadığından, bizi bulmak için ayrıntılı bir takibe girişmez. Kafalarında şiirlerle dolaşan birkaç çatlaktan onlara zarar gelmez. Bunu onlar da biliyor, biz de biliyoruz, herkes biliyor. Nüfusun büyük kısmı Magna Carta ve Anayasa’dan alıntılar yaparak dolaşmadıkça, sorun yok. İtfaiyeciler her zaman için, bunu kontrol etmeye yetiyorlar. Hayır, şehirler bizi rahatsız etmiyor. Sen de felaket gözüküyorsun.
es: —Su aspecto es suficiente. No se ha visto usted últimamente en un espejo. Además, la ciudad nunca se ha preocupado lo bastante de nosotros como para organizar una persecución meticulosa como ésta, con el fin de encontrarnos. Unos pocos chiflados con versos en la sesera no pueden afectarla, y ellos lo saben, y nosotros también. Todos lo saben. En tanto que la mayoría de la población no ande por ahí recitando la Carta Magna y la Constitución, no hay peligro. Los bomberos eran suficientes para mantener esto a raya, con sus actuaciones esporádicas. No, las ciudades no nos preocupan. Y usted tiene un aspecto endiablado.
vi_translation: "Just looking at your appearance is enough. You haven't looked in the mirror recently. Besides, this city has never cared about us enough to go through the trouble of an elaborate hunt to find us. A few crazy guys with nothing but poetry in their heads can't touch them, they know that and we know that; everyone knows that. As long as most people aren't going around quoting the Magna Carta or the U.S. Constitution, everything will be fine. Having the firemen occasionally check on that is enough. No, the cities don't care about us. And you, your appearance is really something else."
tr_translation: “Just one look at you is enough. Haven't you seen yourself in the mirror lately? Besides, since the city never pays attention to us, it doesn't engage in detailed tracking to find us. A few crackpots wandering around with poems in their heads don't harm them. They know this, we know this, everyone knows this. As long as the majority of the population doesn't walk around quoting the Magna Carta and the Constitution, there's no problem. The firefighters are always enough to keep this in check. No, the cities don't bother us. You also look like a disaster.”
es_translation: —Your appearance is enough. You haven't looked at yourself in a mirror lately. Besides, the city has never cared enough about us to organize a meticulous pursuit like this, in order to find us. A few crazies with verses in their heads can't affect it, and they know it, and so do we. Everyone knows it. As long as the majority of the population isn't going around reciting the Magna Carta and the Constitution, there's no danger. The firefighters were enough to keep this in check, with their sporadic actions. No, the cities don't worry us. And you look devilish.
st: "Ponahalo ea hau e lekane. Ha ke so bone ntho e tjena ka seiponeng. Ho feta moo, motse ha ho mohla a hlokomela ho hongata hoo ka rona ho khathatseha ka cha elaborate kang ena ho fumana re. Li-crackpots tse 'maloa tse nang le litemana lihloohong tsa bona li ke ke tsa li ama, 'me lia e tseba' me rea e tseba; E mong le e mong o tseba seo. Hafeela batho ba bangata ha ba so ka ba lelera ka ho qotsa Magna Charta le Molao oa Motheo, ho lokile. Ho ne ho e-na le hoo, ho ne ho e-na le hoo, hona joale le ka nako e 'ngoe. Che, litoropo ha li re khathatse. "You Look Like Hell"
yo: "Ìwò rẹ tó. O kò tí ì rí ara rẹ nínú dígí lẹ́nu ọjọ́ mẹ́ta yìí. Lẹ́yìn ìyẹn, ìlú náà kò bìkítà púpọ̀ nípa wa rí láti dààmú pẹ̀lú ìlépa ńlá bí èyí láti wá wa. Awọn crackpots diẹ pẹlu awọn ẹsẹ ni ori wọn ko le fi ọwọ kan wọn, ati pe wọn mọ ọ ati pe a mọ ọ; Gbogbo ènìyàn ló mọ̀ ọ́n. Níwọ̀n ìgbà tí ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ènìyàn kò bá rìn kiri nípa sísọ̀rọ̀ Magna Charta àti òfin, ó dára. Àwọn panápaná náà tó láti yẹ ìyẹn wò, nísinsìnyí àti lẹ́yìn náà. Rárá, àwọn ìlú ńlá náà kò yọ wá lẹ́nu. Ati pe o dabi apaadi. "
tn: Lebang Kwanele Ga ke ise ke tsamaye ke iteba mo seiponeng. Le fa go ntse jalo, motse ono ga o ise o ke o re tshwenye ka sepe se se ka re tshwenyang ka tsela e e tshwanang le eno. 12Dipotshôsa tse di mo ditlhogong tsa tsona di ka se kgone go di ama, mme di a itse, mme re a di itse; Botlhe ba itse. Le fa go ntse jalo, fa batho ba le bantsi ba sa kgone go bua ka Ga-Magna Charta le Molao wa Motheo, go siame. Go ne go na le batho ba ba neng ba le mo tseleng go bona gone jaanong le ka nako eo. Metse ya rona e ka se re tshwenye. "Hell ya lookin' as that."
ty: " Ua nava'i to oe hi'oraa. Aita outou i ite a'e nei ia outou iho i roto i te hoê hi'o. Taa ê atu i te reira, aita te oire i tâu'a rahi a'enei ia matou no te haapeapea i te hoê tapaparaa rahi mai teie te huru no te imi ia matou. Te vai ra te tahi mau irava i roto i to ratou upoo aita e nehenehe e tape'a ia ratou, e ua ite ratou i te reira e ua ite tatou i te reira ; ua ite te mau taata atoa i te reira. Mai te peu e eita te huiraatira rahi e hahaere noa ma te faahiti i te Magna Charta e te Pǎpǎ ture, e mea maitai roa ïa. Ua navai noa te feia tupohe auahi no te hi'opoa i te reira, i teie nei e i muri iho. Aita, aita te mau oire e haapeapea ra ia tatou. E e au oe mai hade ".
mai: "अहां के देखब काफी अछि। अहां अपना के हाल मे दर्पण मे नहि देखलहुं। एकर अतिरिक्त, शहर हमरासभकेँ तकबाक लेल एहि तरहक विस्तृत पीछासँ परेशान होयबाक लेल हमरासभक एतेक परवाह कहियो नहि कयलक। माथमे छंद बला किछु क्रैकपॉट ओकरा छू नहि सकैत अछि, आ ओ एकरा जनैत छथि आ हमसभ एकरा जनैत छी; सभ एकरा जनैत अछि। जाबत धरि विशाल जनसंख्या मैग्ना चार्टा आ संविधानक उद्धरण करबामे नहि भटकैत अछि, ई सब ठीक अछि। अग्निशामक दल एकर जाँच करबाक लेल पर्याप्त छल, कखनहु-कखनहु। नहि, शहर हमरा परेशान नहि करैत अछि। आ अहां नरक जकां लगैत छी।
mg: "Ampy izay ny fijerinao. Tsy mbola nahita ny tenanao tao amin'ny fitaratra ianao tato ho ato. Ankoatra izany, tsy dia niraharaha loatra ny momba anay ny tanàna mba hanelingelina anay amin'ny fanenjehana goavana tahaka izao mba hahitana anay. Tsy afaka mikasika azy ireo ny triatra vitsivitsy misy andinin-tsoratra masina ao an-dohany, ary fantatr'izy ireo izany ary fantatsika izany; Fantatry ny rehetra izany. Raha mbola tsy mirenireny amin'ny fitanisàna ny Magna Charta sy ny Lalàm-panorenana ny vahoaka marobe, dia tsy maninona izany. Ampy ny mpitandro filaminana mba hanamarinana izany, ankehitriny sy avy eo. Tsia, tsy manelingelina anay ny tanàna. Ary ianao dia tahaka ny afobe. "
dv: ބައްޕަގެ ނަޒަރު ފުދެއެވެ. މިފަހަކަށް އައިސް އައިރާއަކުން އަމިއްލަ ނަފްސު ފެނިފައެއް ނުވެއެވެ. އެއަށްވުރެ އިތުރަށް، އަޅުގަނޑުމެން ހޯދުމަށްޓަކައި މިކަހަލަ ތަނަވަސް ފަހަތުން، އަޅުގަނޑުމެންނާ ދޭތެރޭގައި އެހާ ބޮޑު ފަރުވާލެއް އެ ސިޓީން ނުގެންގުޅެއެވެ. ބޮލުގައި އާޔަތްތައް ހުރި ބައެއް ކްރެކްޕޮޓްތަކަށް އެތަކެތީގައި އަތްނުލެވޭނެއެވެ. އަދި އެއުރެންނަށް އެކަން އެނގެއެވެ. އަދި ތިމަންރަސްކަލާނގެ ދެނެވޮޑިގެންވަމެވެ. އެކަން އެންމެންނަށް ވެސް އެނގެއެވެ. ބޮޑު އާބާދީ މެގްނާ ޗާޓާ އާއި ގާނޫނު އަސާސީއާ ހަވާލާ ދީގެން ނޫޅެވޭހާ ހިނދަކު، ހުރިހާ ކަމެއް ވެސް ރަނގަޅެވެ. ފަޔަރމަނުން ވެސް އެކަން ޗެކްކުރަން ފުދެއެވެ. އެހެންވީމާ، ސިޓީތަކުން އަޅުގަނޑުމެންނަކަށް އުނދަގޫނުވޭ. އަދި ތިޔަބައިމީހުން ފެންނަނީ ނަރަކައެއް ފަދައިންނެވެ.

en: Someone produced a small frying-pan and the bacon went into it and the frying-pan was set on the fire. After a moment the bacon began to flutter and dance in the pan and the sputter of it filled the morning air with its aroma. The men watched this ritual silently.
en_results: "title": "The Old Man and the Sea", "author": "Ernest Hemingway"
vi: Ai đó lấy ra một chảo rán nhỏ, họ cho chỗ thịt hun khói vào đó rồi hơ chảo lên trên lửa. Sau một lát thịt bắt đầu rung rinh nhún nhảy trong chảo, kêu xèo xèo, hương thơm tràn ngập bầu không khí buổi sáng. Nhóm người nhìn cái nghi lễ này trong im lặng.
vi_results: "title": "The Old Man and the Sea", "author": "Ernest Hemingway"
tr: Birisi, bir tava çıkardı ve pastırmayı içine koyup ateşin üstüne kondu. Bir saniye sonra pastırma ateşin içinde oynayıp dans etmeye ve cızırdayarak sabah havasını kokusuyla doldurmaya başladı. Adamlar bu ayini sessizce izlediler.
tr_results: "title": "The Feast of the Goat", "author": "Mario Vargas Llosa"
es: Alguien sacó una pequeña sartén, y el tocino fue a parar a su interior, y empezó a tostarse sobre la hoguera. Al cabo de un momento, el aroma del tocino impregnaba el aire matutino. Los hombres observaban el ritual en silencio.
es_results: "title": "Don Quijote de la Mancha", "author": "Miguel de Cervantes"
vi_translation: Someone took out a small frying pan, they put the bacon in it and held the pan over the fire. After a while, the meat began to sizzle and dance in the pan, filling the morning air with a delicious aroma. The group watched this ritual in silence.
tr_translation: Someone took out a pan and put the bacon in it, then placed it over the fire. A second later, the bacon began to sizzle, dance, and fill the morning air with its aroma. The men watched this ritual in silence.
es_translation: Someone took out a small frying pan, and the bacon ended up inside it, starting to toast over the campfire. After a moment, the aroma of bacon permeated the morning air. The men watched the ritual in silence.
st: Motho e mong o ile a hlahisa li-frying-pane e nyane mme bacon e kene ka har'a eona mme li-frying-pane li ne li behiloe mollong. Kamora nakoana bacon e ile ea qala ho flutter le ho tantša ka pane mme sputter ea eona e tletse moea oa hoseng ka monko oa eona. Banna ba ile ba shebella moetlo ona ka mokhoa o khutsitseng.
yo: Ẹnìkan ṣe àgbéjáde ìkòkò ìdáná kékeré ẹran ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ náà sì wọ inú rẹ̀ wọ́n sì gbé ìkòkò ìdáná náà sórí iná náà. Lẹ́yìn ìgbà díẹ̀ ẹran ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ náà bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ní fọ́ ó sì jó nínú ìkòkò àti pé ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ rẹ̀ kún afẹ́fẹ́ àárọ̀ pẹ̀lú òórùn rẹ̀. Àwọn ọkùnrin náà wo àṣà yìí ní ìdákẹ́jẹ́.
tn: Mongwe o ne a ntsha pane e nnye ya go betla mme bacon ya tsena mo go yone mme pitsa ya go fisiwa mo molelong. Morago ga nakonyana, ba ne ba simolola go bina le go bina mo paneng mme go gôga go ne ga tlala moya wa mo mosong ka monko wa yone. Banna bano ba ne ba bona tiro eno ka tidimalo.

en: And on either side of the river was there a tree of life, which bare twelve manner of fruits, and yielded her fruit every month; And the leaves of the tree were for the healing of the nations.
en_results: "title": "Revelation", "author": "John of Patmos (attributed to John the Apostle)"
vi: Ở giữa quảng trường của thành, giữa hai nhánh sông, có cây Sự Sống sinh trái mười hai lần, mỗi tháng một lần; lá cây dùng làm thuốc chữa lành các dân ngoại 28[2].
vi_results: "title": "Sách không rõ tên", "author": "Không rõ tác giả"
tr: Ve nehrin her iki kıyısında da, dallarında on iki tür meyve bulunan ve her ay aynı meyveyi veren, bir hayat ağacı vardı. Ve bu ağacın yaprakları uluslara şifa vermek içindi.
tr_results: "title": "One Thousand and One Nights", "author": "Muhammed al-Nafawi or possibly a translation by someone else, but the original is attributed to Muhammed al-Nafawi, however, the most well-known translation is by Sir Richard Francis Burton"
es: Y, a cada lado del río, había un árbol de la vida... con doce clases distintas de frutas, y cada mes entregaban su cosecha; y las hojas de los árboles servían para curar a las naciones.
vi_translation: In the middle of the city's square, between two branches of the river, there is the Tree of Life that bears fruit twelve times, once each month; the leaves of the tree are used for the healing of the nations 28[2].
tr_translation: And on both sides of the river, there was a tree of life with twelve kinds of fruit on its branches, yielding the same fruit every month. And the leaves of this tree were for the healing of the nations.
es_translation: And on each side of the river, there was a tree of life... with twelve kinds of fruits, yielding its crop every month; and the leaves of the trees were for the healing of the nations.
st: 'Me ho ne ho e-na le sefate sa bophelo, e leng tse leshome le metso e ea litholoana, 'me o ile a fana ka litholoana tsa sona khoeli le khoeli. Le makhasi a sefate e ne e le bakeng sa pholiso ea lichaba.
yo: Àti pé ní ẹ̀gbẹ́ méjèèjì odò náà ni igi ìyè kan wà, èyí tí ó fẹ́rẹ̀ẹ́ jẹ́ èso méjìlá, tí ó sì ń mú èso rẹ̀ jáde lóṣooṣù; Ati awọn leaves ti awọn igi wà fun iwosan ti awọn orilẹ-ède.
tn: 29Go ne go na le setlhare sa bophelo se se nang ditlhare tse di 12 tsa maungo, mme sa ungwa maungo a sona kgwedi le kgwedi. Mme matlhare a setlhare seo e ne e le go fodisa ditšhaba.
ty: Ia ena dua na wase ni uciwai sa tu kina e dua na vunikau ni bula, ka sa vakasorena e tinikarua na vuana, ka vuataka na vuana ena vula kecega; Ia na rau ni vunikau sa nodra na veivakabulai na veimatanitu.
